content: We are PTS - "Premium Traffic Solutions", a European agency, specializing in providing traffic sources such as Facebook, Google, Taboola (and 5 more sources)😎 Our Benefits:✅Informational client CRM and Website✅Flexible commission system✅Multilingual 24H support✅Qualified tech department❗️MORE IMPORTANTLY! We are working with both payment methods: prepay or postpay (any options)Presently, we offer the following Taboola Advertising Accounts options for sale:☑️Account Cost: $1000. 💰☑️Commission: Additionally We charge a 15% fee on the account balance top-up.💸☑️Account Replacement Before Moderation: If the account gets blocked during the moderation stage before spending, we provide a free account replacement. 🔄☑️Full Launch Support: We offer complete assistance throughout the process of launching ad campaigns on the account. 🚀☑️Withdrawal of Funds in Case of Account Ban: If your account gets banned, you have the option to withdraw the remaining funds from the account. 💳☑️Highest FR: We provide accounts with the highest Relevance Factor (FR), which helps improve the effectiveness of your ad campaigns. 🔝But that's not all! We cater to all advertising verticals and budgets, ensuring that we provide the right accounts for your needs. Our dedicated team is ready to assist you and offer valuable consultation tailored to your requirements.Geo mix, Currency mix* The Best Trust for fb ads🖥 Price varies depending on the quantity you need. The more accounts you purchase, the better the price we can offer!We also have other FB accounts for sale, you can check them out right here👨‍💻Contact your Personal manager for purchase: @pts_katharina (Telegram)PTS - "Premium Traffic Solutions" Contacts:Website: https://pts.agency/Telegram Channel: https://t.me/ptsagencyWe take pride in our commitment to quality and security. That's why we ensure that all our advertising accounts are sold exclusively to a single owner. We believe in providing a personalized and trustworthy experience, giving you complete control over your accounts.
